Body: Description: When investigating EPP logs. We notice that browser downloads has two set of entries: first, a bunch of logs with 'xxxx.crdownload' as source and Chrome as destination, then when completed, it shows the downloaded file as source and Chrome as destination. Why does EPP incorrectly log downloads as potential browser uploads? This creates unnecessary noise in our security monitoring.
What We've Learned Updated: We asked for more details about the scenario where the epp is generating logs for web browser downloads.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for more details from the customer.

What We've Learned Updated: We asked for more details about the scenario where the epp is generating logs for web browser downloads.

We scheduled a remote session for next Monday.

This issue cannot be replicated on demand so we provided the customer with the steps to generate the appended logs for MAC and Linux OS, and after the issue reproduces they will send us the logs to raise and R&D escalation.
